org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

类 RegionAdminServiceCallable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.RegionAdminServiceCallable<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RetryingCallable<T>
    直接已知子类:
    FlushRegionCallable

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public abstract class RegionAdminServiceCallable<T>
extends Object
implements RetryingCallable<T>
    Similar to RegionServerCallable but for the AdminService interface. This service callable assumes a Table and row and thus does region locating similar to RegionServerCallable. Works against Admin stub rather than Client stub.

      • prepare

        public void prepare(boolean reload)
             throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: RetryingCallable
        Prepare by setting up any connections to servers, etc., ahead of call invocation. TODO: We call prepare before EVERY call. Seems wrong. FIX!!!!
        指定者:
        prepare 在接口中 RetryingCallable<T>
        参数:
        reload - Set this to true if need to requery locations
        抛出:
        IOException - e

      • setStub

        protected void setStub(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.AdminService.BlockingInterface stub)

        public HRegionLocation getLocation(boolean useCache)

      • throwable

        public void throwable(Throwable t,
                      boolean retrying)
        从接口复制的说明: RetryingCallable
        Called when call throws an exception and we are going to retry; take action to make it so we succeed on next call (clear caches, do relookup of locations, etc.).
        指定者:
        throwable 在接口中 RetryingCallable<T>
        参数:
        t - throwable which was thrown
        retrying - True if we are in retrying mode (we are not in retrying mode when max retries == 1; we ARE in retrying mode if retries > 1 even when we are the last attempt)

      • getExceptionMessage

        protected String getExceptionMessage()

      • getExceptionMessageAdditionalDetail

        public String getExceptionMessageAdditionalDetail()
        指定者:
        getExceptionMessageAdditionalDetail 在接口中 RetryingCallable<T>
        返回:
        Some details from the implementation that we would like to add to a terminating exception; i.e. a fatal exception is being thrown ending retries and we might like to add more implementation-specific detail on to the exception being thrown.

      • sleep

        public long sleep(long pause,
                  int tries)
        指定者:
        sleep 在接口中 RetryingCallable<T>
        参数:
        pause - time to pause
        tries - amount of tries until till sleep
        返回:
        Suggestion on how much to sleep between retries

      • call

        public T call(int callTimeout)
       throws IOException
        Override that changes Exception from Exception to IOException. It also does setup of an rpcController and calls through to the unimplemented call(PayloadCarryingRpcController) method; implement this method to add your rpc invocation.
        指定者:
        call 在接口中 RetryingCallable<T>
        参数:
        callTimeout - - the time available for this call. 0 for infinite.
        返回:
        computed result
        抛出:
        IOException

      • call

        protected abstract T call(HBaseRpcController rpcController)
                   throws Exception
        Run RPC call.
        参数:
        rpcController - PayloadCarryingRpcController is a mouthful but it at a minimum is a facade on protobuf so we don't have to put protobuf everywhere; we can keep it behind this class.
        抛出:
        Exception
